name: Necro Defense (itch)
description:
Your town is invaded by gigantic ogres. Defense citizens with your Necro Tower. The only thing is you must feed citizen to gain ability to shoot from tower.

Credits:

Nikita Cherniakov - GD, Game Mechanics, Tech Art

Grin Radin - Art, Animations

Artem Boksha - Music, Sound Design

Stanislav Turchenko - AI Mechanics, Game Mechanics

Artem Chernykh - Player Mechanics
